Articles.Content: They are explaining that Mars Express can either point its cameras at Mars, or point the antenna at Earth, but not usually both at the same time. However, they have a narrow window where they can do both at the same time.
Oops. They have lost the live signal due to bad weather at the local Earth ground station. The rains in Spain fall mainly on the groundstation, apparently.

Livestream is about to end.

The entire event was in celebration of the 20th anniversary of the launch of the Mars Express mission.
I’ll have to watch later.     Thanks for posting.
Now if only one of these livestream opportunities would coincide with Saturday night. SNL could have a field day with that!
